        Returns a list of all button views for this IInAppMessageImmersiveView. The default views for in-app messages can contain multiple layouts depending on the number of buttons.
        Specified by:
        getMessageButtonViews in interface IInAppMessageImmersiveView
        Specified by:
        getMessageButtonViews in class AppboyInAppMessageImmersiveBaseView
        Parameters:
        numButtons - The number of buttons used for this layout.
        Returns:
        the child Views that display the message buttons. They should be returned in the same order as the List on the in-app message object so that listeners are set correctly.

      • applyWindowInsets

        public void applyWindowInsets(WindowInsetsCompat insets)
        Applies the WindowInsetsCompat by ensuring the close button and message text on the in-app message does not render in the display cutout area.
        Specified by:

        Overrides:

      • getLongEdge

        public int getLongEdge()
        Returns:

        Returns:
